definitions: the action or fact of sliding unintentionally for a short distance

examples.text: we see lots of orthopedic injuries due to slipping on ice

shortDefinitions: action or fact of sliding unintentionally

definitions: failing to grip or make proper contact with a surface

examples.text: four independent brakes can be applied to slipping wheels to regain traction

shortDefinitions: failing to grip or make proper contact with surface

definitions: passing or changing to a lower, worse, or different condition

examples.text: on Tuesday, two food industry giants reported slipping profits
concerns about slipping standards in higher education

shortDefinitions: passing or changing to a lower, worse, etc. condition
